Learning Begins With Us
-----------------------

We, at Faculty of Artificial Intelligence offer supportive and inspirational environments for young enquiring minds to learn and grow with us. Our passion for learning means we achieve more than outstanding results. We strive to build confident and creative thinkers and aim at delivering an education that is truly relevant to their future.  
  
We are an early learning academy focused on social-emotional development and early literacy and numeracy. Our students walk out with the character and confidence to make their mark in the world, equipped with the knowledge and real-world skills that take them way ahead in the industry they may serve.

[Read More](https://fai.utm.my/faculty/)

[![](https://fai.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/home_image.jpg "home_image")](https://fai.utm.my/undergraduate/)

[](https://fai.utm.my/undergraduate/)

### **[Undergraduate Programmes](https://fai.utm.my/undergraduate/)
**

We offer cutting-edge academics, opportunities for practical learning experiences, internships, and real-world projects and Career-focused emphasizing how the program prepares students for successful careers in their chosen field.

[![](https://fai.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/home_image.jpg "home_image")](https://fai.utm.my/postgraduate/)

[](https://fai.utm.my/postgraduate/)

### **[Master](https://fai.utm.my/postgraduate/)
**  
**[Programmes](https://fai.utm.my/postgraduate/)
**

Elevate your career, unlock your potential, and shape your future as a leader in your field with our Masterâ€™s degree programs; unleash your full potential with our advanced research studies or dive deeper into our specialized coursework programs.

### **[PhD](https://fai.utm.my/postgraduate/#uagb-tabs__tab2)
**  
**[Programmes](https://fai.utm.my/postgraduate/#uagb-tabs__tab2)
**

Accelerate your expertise and expand your horizons as you empower your career journey towards transformative learning with various doctoral programs with us, lead the way to innovate, and forge new frontiers in your research field with our PhD research programs.
